items.name: Huevos Rancheros
items.description: Over-easy eggs topped with mild salsa. Served with rice and beans or hashbrowns, and tortillas.

items.name: Huevos a la Mexicana
items.description: Scrambled eggs mixed with jalapeños, onions, and tomatoes. Served with rice and beans or hashbrowns, and tortillas.

items.name: Huevos con Jamón
items.description: Scrambled eggs with ham. Served with rice and beans or hashbrowns, and tortillas.

items.name: Huevos con Chorizo
items.description: Scrambled eggs with chorizo. Served with rice and beans or hashbrowns, and tortillas.

items.name: Huevos con Bistec
items.description: Eggs of your choice with skirt steak. Served with rice and beans or hashbrowns, and tortillas.

items.name: Chilaquiles con Huevo
items.description: Tortilla strips sautéed in salsa, topped with onions, cheese, sour cream, and three eggs of your choice.

items.name: 2 x 2 x 2
items.description: Two eggs, two sausage, two bacon, hashbrowns, and mushrooms. Includes tortillas.

items.name: Breakfast Burrito
items.description: Sausage, bacon, eggs, hashbrowns, and mushroom in a flour tortilla.

items.name: Some Assembly Required
items.description: Three eggs with your choice of meat and veggies. Served with tortillas, rice and beans or hashbrowns.

items.name: Burrito
items.description: Includes lettuce, tomato, beans, and cheese. Choice of meat include steak, chicken, beef, milanesa, chorizo, or chile relleno.

items.name: Burrito Dinner
items.description: Served with rice and beans.

items.name: Wet Burrito
items.description: Topped with mild green salsa, sour cream, and guacamole.

items.name: Hot Burrito
items.description: Topped with hot red salsa, sour cream, and guacamole.

items.name: Cheddar Burrito
items.description: Topped with nacho cheese and surrounded with chips.

items.name: Suizo Burrito
items.description: Topped with melted cheese and mild red salsa.

items.name: Special Burrito Dinner
items.description: Includes rice and beans. Available with steak, chicken, beef, milanesa, chorizo, chile relleno.

items.name: Tamales
items.description: Flavors include chicken w/ Green Salsa, pork w/ Red Salsa, jalapeño with cheese, Single: $3, 1/2 Dozen: $10.50, Dozen: $19. While supplies last.

items.name: Pineapple and Strawberry Tamales
items.description: Saturday and Sunday Only. Single: $3, 1/2 Dozen: $10.50, Dozen: $19 . While supplies last.

items.name: Regular Taco
items.description: Topped with onion and cilantro. Handmade tortilla +$0.75. Choice of meat include steak, chicken, beef, milanesa, chorizo, or chile relleno.

items.name: Fish or Shrimp Taco
items.description: Topped with onion, cilantro, lettuce, tomato or chiptole style.

items.name: Birria Taco
items.description: Goat meat taco topped with onion and cilantro.

items.name: Fajita Taco (Steak/Chicken/Shrimp)
items.description: Fajita-style meat Topped with onion and green pepper.

items.name: Taco Dinner
items.description: Three tacos with rice and beans. Handmade tortillas +$1.50.

items.name: Fish/Shrimp Taco Dinner
items.description: Three tacos with fish or shrimp, served with rice and beans.

items.name: Pozole
items.description: Pork soup with hominy. Served with cabbage, lime, onion, and jalapeños. Includes tortillas.

items.name: Caldo de Pollo
items.description: Chicken stew with corn, cabbage, squash, carrots, and potato. Side of rice. Includes tortillas.

items.name: Caldo de Res
items.description: Beef stew with corn, cabbage, squash, carrots, and potato. Side of rice. Includes tortillas.

items.name: Menudo
items.description: Tripe soup with traditional garnishes and tortillas.

items.name: Consome de Chivo
items.description: Goat broth served with tortillas and traditional sides.

items.name: Large Family Soup
items.description: Large order (menudo or pozole) that serves 3–4 people. Includes garnishes and tortillas.

items.name: Fajitas de Camarón
items.description: Grilled shrimp with onions and green peppers. Served with rice, beans, tortillas, sour cream, and avocado.

items.name: Fish Fillet Dinner
items.description: Breaded tilapia served with sour cream, avocado, rice, beans, and tortillas.

items.name: Caldo de Camarón
items.description: Shrimp broth with vegetables and side of rice and tortillas.

items.name: Camarones al Chipotle
items.description: Grilled shrimp sautéed in chipotle sauce. Served with avocado, lettuce, tomato, and sour cream.

items.description: Shrimp sautéed in red salsa with Valentina, jalapeños, and tomatoes. Served with avocado, lettuce, and sour cream.

items.name: Ice Cream

items.description: Large quesadilla with choice of meat or cheese, served with lettuce, tomato, sour cream, pico de gallo, and guacamole.

items.description: Nachos with meat, beans, cheese, lettuce, tomato, sour cream, guacamole, and corn.

items.description: Seafood ceviche on a tostada with sour cream and avocado.

items.description: Cheesy birria tacos served with dipping consomé. 3 with consomé: $12.00

items.name: Fajitas
items.description: Chicken or steak with sautéed onions and green peppers. Served with rice, beans, lettuce, tomato, sour cream, and tortillas.

items.description: Stuffed poblano pepper topped with red salsa. Served with rice, beans, lettuce, tomato, and tortillas.

items.name: Enchiladas

items.description: Combination of shrimp, chicken, and steak fajitas with peppers and onions. Served with rice, beans, and tortillas.

items.description: Skirt steak sautéed in salsa with onions, tomatoes, jalapeños, and green peppers. Includes sides and tortillas.

items.description: Sautéed tortilla strips in salsa with cheese, sour cream, onions, and grilled steak.

items.name: Chiles Toreados
items.description: Grilled jalapeños and onions.

items.name: Combo Meal
items.description: Choose 2 items and get rice, beans, and a small drink. Options: Taco (choice of meat), Enchilada (red or green, meat or cheese), Flauta (chicken or beef), Tamal (chicken, pork, jalapeño w/ cheese), Cheese Quesadilla (add meat $1).

items.name: Kids Meal
items.description: Includes fries or rice and beans. Options: 6 pc chicken nuggets, 1 taco (steak, chicken, or beef), or 1 cheese quesadilla (add meat $1).

items.description: Includes Pepsi, Diet Pepsi, Cherry Pepsi, Mtn Dew, Diet Mtn Dew, Starry, Root Beer, Grape Crush, Strawberry Crush.

items.description: Mexican hot chocolate Small ($3), Medium ($4), Large ($5).

items.name: Taco Tray
items.description: 20 tacos with onion & cilantro OR lettuce, tomato, cheese. Chicken, Chorizo, Ground Beef, or Pastor.

items.name: All Steak Taco Tray
items.description: 20 steak tacos with toppings.

items.name: Large Catering Tray
items.description: Feeds 40–50 people. Choose from: Rice, Beans, Chicken Fajitas, Steak Fajitas, Bistec a la Mexicana, Carnitas, Al Pastor, Chicken, Ground Beef.

items.name: Small Catering Tray
items.description: Feeds 10–15 people. Choose from: Rice, Beans, Chicken Fajitas, Steak Fajitas, Bistec a la Mexicana, Carnitas, Al Pastor, Chicken, Ground Beef.

items.name: Full Catering Package
items.description: Minimum 25 people. Includes rice, beans, guacamole, sour cream, chips, red & green salsa, tortillas, salad, and your choice of enchiladas (cheese) or flautas (chicken/beef). Plates/utensils not included.
